meanings.definition: A symbol consisting of three interlocked spirals.
meanings.sent1: The triskele on the ancient artifact represented unity and balance.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with a triskele pendant.
meanings.sent3: The triskele on the flag seemed to spin when the wind blew.
meanings.sent4: The triskele of life, death, and rebirth was a powerful symbol.
meanings.sent5: The triskele etched on the stone tablet was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A design or motif featuring three curved arms radiating from a central point.
meanings.sent1: The triskele pattern on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The triskele on the shield symbolized strength and protection.
meanings.sent3: The triskele on the cake looked like a playful whirlwind of frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her dance movements resembled the graceful flow of a triskele.
meanings.sent5: The triskele design on the tapestry was intricate and beautiful.
